THE FUTURE OF IT

A propos de LFB-Services

Présent en Algérie depuis 2012, nous accompagnons nos clients dans la mise en place de leurs systèmes d'information en leur fournissant les ressources nécessaires pour optimiser et sécuriser leurs patrimoines de données ainsi que l'amélioration de leurs niveaux de services. Notre objectif est de satisfaire les clients que nous accompagnions et d'établir avec eux un partenariat sur le long terme. Nous intervenons sur tous les secteurs d'activité de l'économie algérienne et oeuvrons principalement sur les axes suivants :

  • Infrastructure réseau et systèmes
  • Intégration des solutions d'entreprise (Microsoft, Fortinet, Vmware)
  • Développement d'applications Web/Mobile (Industrialisation de processus métier)
  • Outsourcing/Infogérance

Notre savoir faire

Our experts, made up mainly of engineers, are ready to support you in your various IT projects.

Infrastructure réseau et systèmes

As a partner of the largest IT publishers and manufacturers in the world, we support our customers in the deployment of their system and network infrastructures by providing them with the equipment and assistance necessary for the success of their projects.

Intégration des solutions d'entreprise

Our certified consultants will help you define your needs and translate them into business processes to integrate them into your information system. In addition, our teams ensure throughout the project a transfer of skills to your teams at the start of the (???) production.

Infogérance et Outsourcing

We provide you with the necessary resources to manage your information system. Our contracts are flexible depending on the need and the size of the company. We undertake to intervene according to a predefined schedule with the customer for proactive maintenance operations and to respect the (need clarification) SLAs for specific operations at the customer's request.

Développement

LFB Services covers the entire life cycle of the applications developed, whether it is a website, a mobile application or a business application, we are committed to delivering you a high quality product.
